Meeting Title: Public hearing on the proposed Perennial Wind Chaser Station
Short Description: This is a hearing on the draft proposed order for the proposed natural gas-fired plant planned southwest of Hermiston.

Meeting Title: Public hearing on the draft proposed order for the Brush Canyon Wind Power Facility
Short Description: The proposal is a wind-powered electric generating facility with up to 223 wind turbines and a 32-mile, 230-kilovolt overhead transmission line. The Oregon Department of Energy has issued the draft proposed order on the application for a site certificate, recommending the Energy Facility Siting Council approve the application and grant a site certificate.

Meeting Title: Public information meeting for the proposed Perennial Wind Chaser Station southwest of Hermiston.
Short Description: This meeting is to provide the public with more information about the Perennial application and the site certificate review process. This is not a public hearing.

Meeting Title: Public hearing on the proposed Brush Canyon Wind Power Facility
Short Description: This is a public hearing on the draft proposed order for the Brush Canyon Wind Power Facility, which includes a 32-mile, 230-kilovolt overhead transmission line. The department has issued the draft proposed order on the application for a site certificate, recommending the Energy Facility Siting Council approve the application and grant a site certificate.
